data.title: TripleLens: Calculating light curves for triple microlensing systems
data.name: triplelens
data.description: Calculating light curves for triple microlensing systems

evidence: "Light Curve Calculations for Triple Microlensing Systems" and references to a specific paper indicate a single research codebase rather than a broad community project.
"After compile with \"make\" command, the test example can be run as: ./bin/testtriple" – users compile and run an executable, indicating application-style usage.

"One way to test is rerun MCMC optimization (use this code to calculate magnifications) with the published solutions of triple events as initial guess" – the software directly computes scientific quantities (magnifications) used in research analysis.
